name: The Thing That Fell From Sky
name_original: The Thing That Fell From Sky
description:
Your mission is to recover The Thing That Fell From Sky. You have to do it before the gigantic creature destroys the building you are in. You have 3 minutes and 30 seconds.

This game was made in 14 days for KAIJUJAM.

Controls
  • Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move;
  • Left Mouse Button to interact;
  • Left Shift to run;
  • Left Ctrl to crouch;
  • Space to jump;
  • Tab to open inventory;
  • Esc to pause.
Some Useful Tips
  • The game ends if you don't finish it approximately 3 minutes and a half (00:03:55 being the exact time), but I think that's already very clear if you read the first paragraph;
  • Press Left Mouse Button to skip dialogue.
Something

This is my second released game. It's very unpolished and janky because I kind of got bored by the end and wanted to just finish it to move to my next project (which will be a full game), but I improved my gamedev skills a lot while making it, so I think I achieved what I wanted from this project. I don't think there's need to add more to this game in the future. If you happen to play this game, I hope you at least enjoy this very unpolished and short experience.

Credits
